summary: Just a small mod which adds 5 corrupted humans from the Blight of Dragon Age as enemies in the game
descriptionHtml:
Dragon Age Darkspawn Blight Victims 


Description:

 This Mod adds 5 new angry and interesting enemies into the game. In the events of Dragon Age, 
it can be witnessed that some humans get infected by Darkspawn during the Blight and in return they also become Darkspawn in days or less 
because of the corruption that flows in their veins. Well, in this mod 5 humans that are infected \"half-darkspawn\" are added into the game 
awaiting their death by you while frienzingly trying to kill anything else that stands in their way. They are located apparently east of Pinewatch (Falkreath Hold) 
on the mountain where a burnt up cabin is located.They are scatered in they clearing so that low level characters (around 1-6 level) can somewhat pull each one
and kill them with more ease. The reason for this is that they are level 15 and their \"boss\" (the one inside the cabin) is 20.However they shouldn\'t be much of a
problem for level 10+ characters as they only wield daggers and wear clothing. Anyways... Good hunting and as always...

 
                                                                                                                      !!!ENJOY!!!
author: Kotaidakos
